channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: President Joe Biden told CNN on Wednesday he would halt some shipments of US weapons to Israel if Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ordered a major invasion of the city of Rafah. Follow for live updates.

item.title: 3 children, 2 adults in critical condition in San Antonio shooting
item.description: Five individuals, including three children under 10, were shot at a residence in San Antonio, Texas, Wednesday night.

item.title: May 8, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: US President Joe Biden told CNN on Wednesday he would halt some shipments of American weapons to Israel if Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ordered a major invasion of the city of Rafah.

item.title: Transair Boeing 737 skids off runway in Senegal
item.description: An airplane owned by Transair, a regional commercial airline, skidded off a runway in Senegal early Thursday.

item.title: House kills motion to vacate Johnson from speakership
item.description: The House on Wednesday rejected an effort by GOP Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene to oust Speaker Mike Johnson.

item.title: Destruction in Gaza: Side-by-side aerial look at the Israel-Hamas war's damage
item.description: Thousands of mosques, churches, homes, restaurants, colleges and other buildings have been turned to rubble across the Gaza Strip amid Israel’s war with Hamas.

item.title: Congress grills liberal cities' school districts over antisemitism
item.description: Colleges and universities held graduation ceremonies over the weekend as pro-Palestinian protests continued on campuses across the US. Follow for live updates

item.title: No hate crime charges filed against man who yelled racist slurs at Utah women's basketball team
item.description: A northern Idaho prosecutor won’t bring hate crime charges against an 18-year-old accused of shouting a racist slur at members of the Utah women’s basketball team while the team was in Idaho to attend the NCAA Tournament

item.title: May 7, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israeli airstrikes killed multiple people in Rafah early Tuesday, Palestinian officials said,

item.title: Shohei Ohtani's interpreter to plead guilty to stealing millions from baseball star
item.description: Ippei Mizuhara, the former interpreter for MLB star Shohei Ohtani, has agreed to plead guilty to bank fraud in relation to stealing nearly $17 million from the player.
